title: Court-appointed team fails to survey Gyanvapi mosque - Hindustan Times

description: The committee on Saturday filed a petition in the court of civil judge Ravi Kumar Diwakar, urging him to replace Kumar. After hearing the matter, the court directed the plaintiffs and the advocate commissioner to present their arguments on May 9.
